text: Ej kasone, ki ʙa Alloh va rasulas imon ovardaed, va ʙa sari'ati U amal kardaed, xud va xonavodai xudro ʙo ancom dodani amrhoi Alloh va man'kardahos az otase, ki hezumi on mardum va sangho hastand, nigah dored. Faristagone durustguftoru saxtgir ʙar on otas muvakkaland. Har ci Alloh ʙigujad, nofarmoni namekunand va hamon mekunand, ki ʙa on amr sudaand
